price: Sua ordem, quando deseja alguma cousa, é, apenas, dizer-lhe: "Sê", então, é.
arabic: إِنَّمَآ أَمۡرُهُۥٓ إِذَآ أَرَادَ شَيۡـًٔا أَن يَقُولَ لَهُۥ كُن فَيَكُونُ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: innamā amruhu idhā arāda shayan an yaqūla lahu kun fayakūnu
